Thanks so much.  Having these thermometers helps us serve more clients in our programs.  We are now able to give each cottage, school building, and cottage managers their own thermometers for their staff and their clients.  These thermometers are efficient and accurate, so much more accurate than the digital ones we have been using.  This makes the nursing department very happy! Jill Backer, RN MSDirector of NursingEdgewood Center for Children and Families

Astonishing delivery time. When I got the shipping email, it said it was leaving a factory in Hong Kong. I was shocked when FedEx dropped it off at my house in the US 36 hours later. Aside from that, the product performs really well. It has to be the best performing IR device in this price range. It can see tiny variations in temps, has a pretty long range for my uses as a homeowner, and I'm just overall very impressed with the whole experience. For reference, I'm just a DIY homeowner trying to do a little bit of weatherizing. If that sounds like you, this is the product to get for sure. All the competitors with similar features are nearly double the price.

Bought my Thermal Imaging Camera IR0019 a few weeks ago, delivery was reasonably fast. Just a few days ago I was actually able to use it for the first time.  In one of my friends garage, he had a smoldering burn behind the celling of his work shop, lot's of smoke in the attic of the work shop. We where able to find the hot spot from underneath, from the work shop side, aiming the camera up at the ceiling (15 feet distance). I was very pleased, it already paid off. Always again, Thank you

High recommend the hydroponic grower!  I can now grow fresh herbs inside my apartment which is great.  The system works well and also looks nice (not too bulky or industrial looking).  Very reliable and am happy with mine.

We ordered the IR0005 Thermal Camera to troubleshoot a leak in the wall of a couple of units in our condominium. The IR0005 Thermal Camera targeted that the roof was the problem to investigate. Once that was fixed we were able to see how ingress affected the inner walls of the condo. We followed that with a basic pinless moisture meter to isolate exactly where the problem was and how concerning it should be and are able to monitor the drying process without opening the wall. This 2 pronged approach helped us avoid a costly restoration company and plumber visits. We went straight to the roofer for repairs and could monitor our own inner wall moisture problems. I would recommend the IR0005 Thermal Camera for just such an approach. It worked as suggested and we have one now in case a further incident should arise.
took care of needs promptly

Review.Titre: IR0006 is good value, company is responsive and fair
Review.Contenu: The unit arrived quickly and worked as specified. It developed a physical problem with the screen. The company, based in Hong Kong with a commercial presence in Canada, was responsive and fair. They sent me a new unit that continues to work well. Regarding the unit, it works as expected and delivers reliable results. The cost per IR pixel is low and the user selectable modes are useful.Dynamic colour spectrum ranging and corresponding multiple dynamic spot temperature readouts are particularly useful.I would buy another product from this company.

PerfectPrime's thermometer TC0304 is very well made and perfectly works with my python RS232 reading module. I am really happy with the customer service team, the name is Andy who informed the protocol ASAP. Thanks, guys.

Review.Titre: Using the TC41 for verifying temperature on heat presses for dye sublimation
Review.Contenu: I have been using a paper thermometers to verify temperature on heat presses for the dye sublimation industry for several years.  During that time, I continued to wonder if other, more accurate options were available.  I researched some other products, but none of them seemed suitable.  The requirements I have are the ability to measure temperature at 4 points on the heat presses.  Thermocouples would be required due to the size of these presses and the need to measure temperature under heat, pressure and time.  These presses are anywhere from 11 inches by 14 inches to 48 inches by 96 inches.  These presses utilize up to 4 heating elements, depending upon the size of the press.  So far the TC41 has worked very well for my needs.  The device reads slightly lower than the gauge on the heat press, but is far less subjective than using paper thermometers.

Review.Titre: I’m very happy in all aspects
Review.Contenu: I’m very happy in all aspects, after sale really helpful, click response and reliable, products work great, fast shipping, only thing are shipping cost bit much.

Review.Contenu: We were able to source exactly what we needed, quickly, at a great cost, and it was delivered exactly on time.  We will definitely be using PerfectPrime for future orders.

Review.Titre: Good easy to use handheld thermometer
Review.Contenu: Good easy to use handheld thermometer, it operates by pressing trigger and switches automatic off so very convenient. I use thermometer to control heating of engine parts and has proven useful. Clear integrated laserpointer helps to target the surface you want to check and is safety wise only active while scanning to avoid undesired laser radiation. The display is clearly visible, backlight is handy for use in the dark. Only impovement is that I miss an possibility to attach wrist strap, used for digital camera’s, to prevent unit to drop.Makkelijk te bedienen contactloze thermometer, schakelt direct in bij indrukken knop zonder bediening op display. Ik  gebruik het voor verwarmen van motor onderdelen en daarvoor is het een handig ding. Schakelt vanzelf uit om lang met batterij te doen, is ook makkelijk. Duidelijke laserpointer om te weten waar de temperatuur gemeten wordt en alleen actief wanneer er gemeten wordt zodat je niet per ongeluk in de straal kijkt. Verlichte display is handig voor donkere inzet, ik mis alleen mogelijk om koordje zoals bij digitale camera vast te zetten om de thermometer aan je pols te kunnen laten bungelen.

First of all I was very pleased with how fast I received it.I had little trouble figuring out how to use it.I’m a plumber and use it to locate leaks and it does quite well. Bottom line, I would buy it again and recommend it to other plumbers as well
